name: anfw-automate
description: Automate AWS Network Firewall Rule Management

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:modules
scripts.build:modules: npm run build:app && npm run build:firewall && npm run build:vpc
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:modules
scripts.test:modules: npm run test:app && npm run test:firewall && npm run test:vpc
scripts.clean: npm run clean:modules && npm run clean:artifacts
scripts.clean:modules: cd app && npm run clean || true && cd ../firewall && npm run clean || true && cd ../vpc && npm run clean || true && cd ../shared && npm run clean || true
scripts.lint:modules: cd app && npm run lint || true && cd ../firewall && npm run lint || true && cd ../vpc && npm run lint || true && cd ../shared && npm run lint || true
scripts.update:modules: cd app && npm update && cd ../firewall && npm update && cd ../vpc && npm update && cd ../shared && npm update
scripts.synth:modules: cd app && npx cdk synth && cd ../firewall && npx cdk synth && cd ../vpc && npx cdk synth

author: AWS Network Firewall Team

validate-branch-name.errorMsg: Branch name must follow the pattern: main, dev, feature/*, hotfix/*, or release/*
